org.svvrl.goal.gui.pref

Class FontUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.gui.pref.FontUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class FontUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    The FontUpdater is aware of the change of system font and drawing font. When the font has been changed, this updater will update the UI.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
